article_title: 19th District candidate calls foul on GOP nomination process

og.description: The state Senate candidate who jumped into the 19th District race just ahead of the deadline said Thursday he was galvanized to run after retiring Sen. Ralph Smith paved the way for his aide, David Suetterlein, to lock down the Republican nomination.
og.title: 19th District candidate calls foul on GOP nomination process
